summary: Completed comprehensive testing of dashboard date filtering and trend charts feature. All backend APIs and frontend UI components are working correctly.

design_issues.issue: Console warnings about chart width/height being -1 during initial render
design_issues.note: Charts render correctly after initial load, warnings are cosmetic

passed_tests: Backend /api/trends endpoint with date range parameters
Dashboard date preset dropdown (7d, 30d, 90d, YTD, All Time)
Stat cards updating based on date selection
All 4 trend charts rendering (Calories, Volume, Sets, Workouts)
Chart data visualization with proper gradients and colors
